unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Hypothesis Setup
question_text: A local sandwich shop decided to slash their prices in an attempt to increase weekly sales. Historically, their gross sales have been $\$6{,}515$ per week. Since slashing their prices, the last $10\text{ weeks}$ have averaged $\$6{,}879$ per week in sales with a standard deviation of $\$400$ . If the manager wishes to test whether the sales promotion was successful, what would the appropriate null and alternative hypotheses be?

choices.text: H 0 : μ = 0 H 0 : μ = 0 H a : μ > 0 H a : μ > 0
